fetch.userQuotesInGuild: SELECT * FROM QUOTES WHERE user_id={GUILD_ID} AND guild_id={USER_ID};
fetch.guildColor: SELECT embed_color FROM GUILDS WHERE guild_id={GUILD_ID};
fetch.guildAnnouncementChannel: SELECT announcement_channel FROM GUILDS WHERE guild_id={GUILD_ID};

set.privateRoles: INSERT IGNORE INTO PRIVATE_ROLES(role_id, guild_id) VALUES ({ROLE_ID}, {GUILD_ID});
set.userQuote: INSERT INTO QUOTES(user_id, guild_id, quote, time) VALUES ()
